title: Textile, ca. 1760
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: chain stitch embroidery in colored silks and chenille on rib weave
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description: White ribbed silk embroidered in colored silks and chenille (in chain stitch) in design of interlacing stems and floral sprays.
